Tucson looks back at Guiledart and snakes the tip of his tail over his cann=
on in a sinisterly, playful manner.  He then retracts his tail and snakes i=
t tauntingly over Hard Head and Hydra's weapons.  If he wanted to he could =
snap his tail and cause them to drop their weapons but he decides just to h=
ave a little fun with the trio instead.

" Energy weapons will only take yo=
u so far.  Now, if I wanted to, I could constrict your weapons to the point=
 of implosion, just with a coil of my tail but, I think I'll be nice this t=
ime and spare you all the humility. I wouldn't want you to look bad around =
your master would I?  But how fun it would be to sssstrangle all of you in =
the coils of my tail."

He talks with a chilling hiss in his voice.  He kne=
w that a little theatrics went a long way.  When in doubt play the part of =
a beast that is commonly feared for his predatory nature.  It was definitel=
y not in his character but he knew he had to step outside the box this time=
.  Everyone depended on him, and he wasn't about to let anyone down.  

Alo=
ng the way, he comes across a piece of metal on the ground.  It gets caught=
 in his tail which coils around it, breaking it into tiny pieces,

Perpetua=
lly on the move and constantly busy.
